title: Whispers of What If
snippet: Letting go of the 'what-ifs,' and cherishing the 'what was'

title: Beyond the 'Would': When Life Gets in the Way
snippet: The 'would' is strong, but sometimes, life's limits write a different story.

title: The Internship Didn't Happen, But Nasi Pecel Did
snippet: A 'no' today, but the path ahead is clearer, and tastes like nasi pecel.

title: The Value of Falling Down
snippet: Every loss wasn't a failure, but a building block for the win that truly mattered.

title: From Whispers to Mountains
snippet: The strength wasn't in reaching the peak, but in the courage to keep climbing when the whispers told me to stop.
